about.title: Our Story
about.intro: Since 1985, Le Petit Coin has been welcoming guests in a warm, authentic atmosphere in the heart of the Croix-Rousse district in Lyon.
about.image_alt: Interior of Le Petit Coin bistro
about.family_p1: Founded by Marie and Jean-Claude Dubois, Le Petit Coin carries on a culinary tradition passed down through generations. Today, their son Antoine welcomes you with the same passion for authentic cuisine and local products.
about.family_p2: Our open kitchen lets guests see the chef at work, preparing every dish with love. We prioritize short supply chains and work with local producers to offer fresh, quality ingredients.

team.antoine_bio: Passionate about traditional French cuisine since childhood
team.sophie_bio: Smiling and attentive, she ensures your well-being
team.paul_bio: Sauce expert and lover of homemade desserts
